profitability_metrics.description: Measures a company's ability to generate sustainable earnings and absorb losses.

metric_description.net_income_to_assets: Shows how efficiently a company generates profit from its assets by comparing net income to total assets.

capital_adequacy_and_leverage_metrics.description: Assesses the company's capacity to absorb volatility, manage debt, and maintain financial flexibility.

metric_description.equity_to_tangible_assets: Indicates how much of a company's tangible assets are financed by its own equity, reflecting financial strength and asset-backed stability.

asset_quality_metrics.description: Evaluates the risk and performance of assets, focusing on impairments and losses.

metric_description.problem_loans_to_gross_loans: Indicates the proportion of loans that may not be repaid, signaling the company’s loan quality.
metric_description.net_charge_offs_to_gross_loans: Measures loan losses after recoveries, highlighting the company’s effectiveness in managing bad debts.

cash_flow_and_liquidity_metrics.description: Assesses the ability to generate cash and manage liquidity for financial obligations and growth.

metric_description.debt_maturities_coverage: Assesses whether the company has enough liquid resources to cover debts due within the next year.
metric_description.funds_from_operations_to_debt: Tracks the company’s ability to generate cash from operations to pay off debt, adjusted for loans and losses.
metric_description.secured_debt_to_tangible_assets: Examines how much of the company’s assets are pledged as collateral for secured debt.
